title: MECHANICAL PROTECTION
fullText:
Battery system cables shall be protected against mechanical damage by â€”
(a) installing the cables in a wiring enclosure or conduit; or
(b) using cables with mechanical protection (e.g. armoured cables).
NOTE 1 Mechanical protection is required to protect against damage from rodents, impact, abrasion and other mechanical damage.
NOTE 2 Mechanical protection may be provided by the battery system enclosure if the cables are installed within the enclosure.
NOTE 3 Mechanical protection may be provided by the PCE enclosure if the cables are installed within the enclosure.
